parameters.name: CategoryId
parameters.description: The ID of the associated category.

parameters.name: DbId
parameters.description: The ID of a physical database: You can call the [ListDatabases](~~141873~~) or [SearchDatabase](~~141876~~) operation to obtain the physical database ID.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the table. You can call the [ListTables](~~141878~~) operation to query the table name.

parameters.name: TableSchemaName
parameters.description: The schema name of the table, which is required only for SQL Server instances.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The tenant ID. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to obtain the tenant ID.
